pullRequest.title: Add timeout for acquiring locks in HiveTableOperations
pullRequest.bodyText: The PR is trying to address issue #399

commit.message: Add timeout for acquiring locks in HiveTableOperations

nodes.bodyText: How about iceberg.hive.lock-timeout-ms instead? It isn't a Hive option, it is an Iceberg option for working with Hive; that's why I think we should use the iceberg namespace.
There's no need for this field to be in a separate group.
Nit: no need to align variable names.
Same here, I don't think we need to separate the lock timeout setting from the other fields that are getting initialized.
How about "Timed out after %s ms waiting for lock on %s.%s"? I don't think we need to specify the config property or the timeout threshold.
